# `NSUM`: Network Scale Up Method

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/coalesce-lab/NSUM/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/coalesce-lab/NSUM/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a fork of the **NSUM** package developed by @rpkg-NSUM. The package is currently archived on CRAN. This repository aims at reviving it.


## Installation

You can install the development version of NSUM like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("coalesce-lab/NSUM")
```
